reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Strengthening China's evidence discovery procedure in intellectual property litigation

description.narrative: The project is designed to draw upon UK and EU experience to develop China's trademark system and brand management practice by working with its government and its legal and industrial sectors raising awareness and capacity building. This is intended to enhance the institutional environment for brand operations of companies operating in China, including UK ones. For example, they will be better-placed to protect their revenues and derive further income by licensing or sale of brand rights.
